title: Barrier Analysis Project for Adopting Learning Design Tools Using Mixed Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational technology theories and language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Pedagogical competency development program for pre-service and in-service teachers. Focuses on applying instructional design tools to address challenges in actual educational settings while cultivating mixed-methods research design skills

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three major barriers to adopting instructional design tools.
Learners can systematically analyze educational field problems by applying mixed-methods research methodologies.
Based on results derived from project-based learning, learners can propose at least two practical solutions.
Learners can compare the strengths, weaknesses, and utilization strategies of various digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

resources: Research Methodology Guidelines Including Delphi Technique Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
